00024 #endif
00025 #include <FdoStd.h>
00026 #include <fdo/Connections/IConnectionPropertyDictionary.h>
00027 
00028 /// \brief
00029 /// The FdoIConnectionInfo interface exposes information about the feature provider
00030 /// and provides access to the FdoIConnectionPropertyDictionary interface.
00031 class FdoIConnectionInfo : public GisIDisposable
00032 {
00033 public:
00034     /// \brief
00035     /// Gets the name of the feature provider.
00036     /// 
00037     /// \return
00038     /// Returns the provider name
00039     /// 
00040     FDO_API virtual GisString* GetProviderName() = 0;
00041 
00042     /// \brief
00043     /// Gets the display name of the feature provider.
00044     /// 
00045     /// \return
00046     /// Returns the provider's display name
00047     /// 
00048     FDO_API virtual GisString* GetProviderDisplayName() = 0;
00049 
00050     /// \brief
00051     /// Gets the description of the feature provider.
00052     /// 
00053     /// \return
00054     /// Returns the provider description
00055     /// 
00056     FDO_API virtual GisString* GetProviderDescription() = 0;
00057 
00058     /// \brief
00059     /// Gets the version of the feature provider.
00060     /// 
00061     /// \return
00062     /// Returns provider version
00063     /// 
00064     FDO_API virtual GisString* GetProviderVersion() = 0;
00065 
00066     /// \brief
00067     /// Gets the version of the Feature Data Objects specification to which this provider conforms.
00068     /// 
00069     /// \return
00070     /// Returns FDO version supported.
00071     /// 
00072     FDO_API virtual GisString* GetFeatureDataObjectsVersion() = 0;
00073 
00074     /// \brief
00075     /// Gets the FdoIConnectionPropertyDictionary interface that can be used to dynamically query and set the properties required to establish a connection.
00076     /// 
00077     /// \return
00078     /// Returns the property dictionary
00079     /// 
00080     FDO_API virtual FdoIConnectionPropertyDictionary* GetConnectionProperties() = 0;
00081 };
00082 #endif
